channel.title: Flamescape Classic Is Back!
channel.description:
Its Back! now up 24/7 With Dedi!
Server Features: Dedicated Staff Custom Rares Custom NPC Warper Gambling NPCs Defence guy [b]Great Custom Weapons and armor[/b] [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/197/screenshot10s.png[/img] 75x Exp for combat 30x Skill Exp Dedicated Players Forums with Updates Even though i dont like autoing, the admins told me to say Autoing IS allowed here
Commands: ::Stuck ::Skill ::Skull ::Fatigue ::Freeforall (dm arena) ::offer __ ____ (10 10000 would offer 10k gp)
Pictures: [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/2046/28807979.png[/img]
[size=25pt]Join now, Link in my Siggy[/size]

item.title: Flamescape Classic Is Back!
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

first off, i can edit more than xml and there is more than xml into my server. i could add more, simply the fact that i don’t doesn’t mean i’m not capable. i’m a college computer science student who has been working on computers for years programming. long before college even began for me. i am busy, and i do things for my server when i have time. honestly, it is not my top priority, but i do check up on it daily. best i can do sorry divinity.

Read full topic

item.title: Flamescape Classic Is Back!

item.description:
@Divinity wrote:

So you appear to be able to edit xml, congrats. Also for the server, I’m not going to lie I was expecting to see a RS2 server as soon as I clicked this topic. I believe the name isn’t very suitable, especially with the “scape” attachment at the end. But, i could be wrong and just very judgemental but I’m just putting out my own opinion so don’t get mad at it.

item.title: Flamescape Classic Is Back!
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

If you aren’t in the EST time zone, it isn’t hard to figure out when it is.

This event is going to be held in the special arena. The requirement is level 85 combat and anything goes. Last 5 people standing get rewarded.

#1: - Choice of:
a) Partyhat {Yellow, Cyan, Black, White, Blue, Green, Red, Pink, Orange}, Dragon Med, Dragon Square, Dragon Ammy, and Iban Staff, Scythe
b) Bunny Ears, Dragon Med, Dragon Square, Dragon Ammy, and Iban Staff, Scythe
c) Halloween Mask {Purple, Silver, Red, Blue, Green, Black}, Dragon Med, Dragon Square, Dragon Ammy, and Iban Staff, Scythe

#2 - Choice of:
a) Partyhat {Cyan, Black, Green, Red, Pink, Orange}, Iban Staff
b) Mask {Purple, Silver, Black}, Iban Staff

#3 Choice of:
a) Partyhat {Cyan, Black, Red, Pink, Orange}
b) Mask {Purple, Black}

#4/#5 Choice of:
a) Partyhat {Cyan, Black, Orange}
b) Mask {Black}

At 5:00 players will be allowed to enter the arena until 5:10, unless there are unless than 10 participants for whatever reason then access will be granted until at least 10 people are present in the tournament, then access to the arena will be disabled, Only way out of the arena will be death.

Anything goes. There is an alter in the arena.

If you are any combat level other than 85 you will not be allowed to enter the arena. I will assist those who accidently go over and request a stat change. Stats can always be lowered, never increased.

Read full topic
